segments.text: Excuse me . Could you tell me if the bus goes the national history museum ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . It doesn ’ t . There ’ s no through bus to the national history museum Madam ..
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . Where do I have to change them ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can transfer at Cuchan Men .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , it ’ s only three stops from here .
